sentence.Network_en: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentence.Network_cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes they have to chop down a tree for firewood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们有时只好砍树当柴烧。

sentence.Network_en: He awoke to find himself lying uncomfortably on a pile of firewood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他醒来发现自己躺在一堆柴火上，很不舒服。

entry.def: Firewood is wood that has been cut into pieces so that it can be burned on a fire.

sentences.sentence: "they collected and cut their own firewood"

auth_sentence.content: Maybe it's time to start growing some firewood.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe it's time to start growing some firewood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe it's time to start growing some firewood.

sentences.en: He has already sawn the branches up;now we have plenty of firewood.
sentences.cn: 他已把树枝锯成小段,现在我们有足够的木柴了。

sentences.en: He cut down the tree and cut it up for firewood.
sentences.cn: 他把树砍倒,并把它劈成烧火用的小块。
